title: r/Prorevenge She Stole From Us, So We Stole From Her!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's episode, a spoiled little brat decides that she's going to steal from her friends by doing a dine-and-dash and forcing her friends to pay for her mail. After the spoiled Karen burns her friends a few times, they decide to get revenge on her by tricking her into paying for ALL of their meals at a super expensive restaurant! Karma is sweet! If you like this episode, be sure to follow for more daily Reddit content!
